job_purpose: Design, develop, and provide operational support for products and platforms used by staff, strata managers, and clients while providing technical leadership and guidance to other engineers.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead the end-to-end design and implementation of LLM-driven features
Develop reusable prompt libraries and orchestration layers
Engage in community and social responsibility initiatives
required_qualifications: Proven track record building with large language models and generative AI
Educational Qualifications in Computer Science or related discipline
preferred_qualifications: Experience with GraphQL, AWS, Power Automate, or performance/load testing
Experience with mobile development frameworks like React Native, Ionic, or PWA
company_details: Town Square is reenvisioning Strata Management Software and offers an innovative technology environment, impactful projects, employee wellbeing focus, community and social responsibility initiatives, and RAC perks.
